title: Allow to create/delete contact from an extension
body:
### User Story

As a developer, I want to be able to create/delete a contact from an [extension](https://status.im/extensions/) event.

### Description

*Type*: Feature

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 80.0 DAI (80.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it as part of the Status-im fund.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7352/2222). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7352/2222). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $54,306.31 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
